definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
to lend on interest/to borrow/a loan/leniency/to make excuses/to pardon/to forgive

sentences.english: The global wholesale lending market is where big banks lend to one another.
sentences.chinese: 全球性貸款批發市場是大型銀行彼此放貸的地方。

sentences.english: With more than 10 lenders say, their money is ultimately to Shi Guobao.
sentences.chinese: 受訪的十多名放貸者稱，他們的錢最終是給石國豹的。

sentences.english: He is being forced into this borrowing.
sentences.chinese: 這次放貸他是出於無奈。

sentences.english: In addition to its lending, the government is showering money on the private sector through direct spending.
sentences.chinese: 除放貸外，政府還通過直接支出向私營經濟大筆散錢。

sentences.english: Since the Tang Dynasty In China, the government used the loan system to collect revenue.
sentences.chinese: 中國自唐代起，官府大量用放貸法來籌措財源。

sentences.english: Anti-poverty campaigners can admire their efforts to offer banking services to the illiterate.
sentences.chinese: 反貧困組織給文盲放貸值得欽佩。

sentences.english: Like Angest, he only lends out half his deposits.
sentences.chinese: 與昂斯特一樣，他只會拿出銀行一半的存款用來放貸。

sentences.english: “The money lender lives in the community, ” he said.
It did so largely on the back of bank lending.
sentences.chinese: 它這樣做主要是受到了銀行放貸的支持。

sentences.english: The banks fell over each other to lend money as they jostled for market share.
sentences.chinese: 銀行競相追求市場份額，於是爭先發放貸款。

sentences.english: The goal was to slow bank lending and control inflation.
sentences.chinese: 目標是減緩銀行放貸和控制通貨膨脹。

sentences.english: And lenders to banks are only willing to make shorter-term loans.
sentences.chinese: 給這些銀行借錢的放貸者只願提供短期貸款。

sentences.english: Lenders say that less than 10 percent of borrowers have made payments in the past couple of weeks.
sentences.chinese: 放貸者說這幾周只有不到10%的貸款者還錢。

sentences.english: Commercial banks make few loans to minors and unauthorized persons.
sentences.chinese: 商業銀行很少對未成年人和未經授權者發放貸款。

sentences.english: 'There is an irrational unwillingness among the banks to lend, ' he said.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，銀行中存在無理性的不願放貸的想法。

sentences.english: The Federal Reserve began lending to investment banks.
sentences.chinese: 美聯儲開始向各投資銀行發放貸款。

definition: to lend money (for interest)/to give credit
to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
variant of 巨額|巨额[ju4 e2]
to underwrite (i.e. guarantee financing)/underwriting/to sell as agent/consignee
